This is a sub-value field which allows a list of applications to be entered. The restriction will only apply to the applications entered, however, if the field is left blank then the restriction will apply to all applications.
Must be a valid application in the PGM.FILE.
This application is used to set up relationships between certain customers, transactions etc.
This allows applications to search through this file & obtain lists of restrictions which apply to certain transactions.
The key to the application is constructed in the following way:
* ALL - All transcations are applicable to this group of restrictions e.g. ALL.SC
* CUSTOMER - Only the customer number is applicable to this group of restrictions e.g. 50030.SC
* PORTFOLIO - Only the potfolio number is applicable to this group of restrictions e.g. 50030-1.SC
* ACCOUNT - Only the account number is applicable to this group of restrictions e.g. 18345.SC
An ID which adheres to the rules above.
